instructions: Tap Settings > Privacy > Location Services on your iOS device. Use the slider at the top of the screen to turn location services on. Tap Share My Location . Tap the slider next to Share My Location to turn on the feature. (Green means the feature is activated.) Tap From to select from which of your iOS devices you want to share your location. (Typically, this is your iPhone, but it could be your iPad, for example.) Next, open the Facebook app on your iOS device. Tap the three-horizontal-line menu icon on the bottom right of the Facebook app. Tap Nearby Friends . (You may first need to tap See More .) Tap the three vertical dots on the top right of the screen, which will take you to Settings . Tap the slider to turn on Nearby Friends.
